snippet.title: World of Aircraft: Glider Simulator | Official Teaser | Aerosoft
snippet.description:
OUT NOW
STEAM | https://store.steampowered.com/app/1041520/World_of_Aircraft_Glider_Simulator/
Aerosoft shop | https://www.aerosoft.com/en/flight-simulation/preview/2761/world-of-aircraft-glider-simulator

Experience general aviation as never before! World of Aircraft is a series of stand-alone simulators that each focus on a specific kind of flying. World of Aircraft – Glider Simulator includes a series of (motor-) gliders and tow aircraft based on a high-definition flying area.

For more news and information follow us:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Aerosoft​​​

Twitter: https://twitter.com/aerosoftgmbh​​​

#glidersimulator​​​ #worldofaircraft​​​ #aerosoft​​
